sex.Description: sex of the participant as reported by the participant

iq.Description: estimated IQ of the participant according to the Word Accentuation Test (Gomar JJ, Ortiz-Gil J, McKenna PJ, Salvador R, Sans-Sansa B, Sarr√≥ S, et al. Validation of the Word Accentuation Test (TAP) as a means of estimating premorbid IQ in Spanish speakers. Schizophr Res. 2011;128: 175-176. doi:10.1016/j.schres.2010.11.016)

group.Description: experimental group the participant belonged to

Levels.AVH-: individuals with schizophrenia without current auditory hallucinations
Levels.AVH+: individuals with schizophrenia with current auditory hallucinations

psyrats.Description: scores in the PSYRATS-H scale to measure hallucination severity (only for patients with schizophrenia)
